title: President of the Whole Sixth Grade
description: In this follow-up to President of the Whole Fifth Grade , Brianna navigates her toughest challenge middle school!Brianna Justice is determined to raise enough money for the big class trip to Washington, D.C., but she's up against a classmates who all pretend to be something they're not, a new nemesis determined to run her out of office, and the sinking feeling she's about to lose her two best friends for good. But just when she begins to lose hope, she comes to realize that sometimes surprises can turn out even better than the best-laid plans.Sherri Winston tells a story brimming with humor and heart as Brianna navigates the ins and outs of middle school, discovering that inspiration can come when you least expect it.
author: Sherri Winston
